item.description:
Saturday Night Fever Ball!!! SINGLES WELCOME. There will be plenty of Singles to dance with. Try the all-levels Hustle class which starts at 7:15pm followed by a social dance from 8-11pm. Dance hosts & social mixers gets everyone up and dancing to Latin, Ballroom & Contemporary music. The lounge area hosts a cash bar, coffee service and lite refreshments. There will be live performances this night.

Admission is $15pp which includes the lesson, dance & refreshments. 70's dress attire.

group.name: Salsa, Swing, Latin & Ballroom Dancers of Metro Worcester

item.name: Saturday Night Fever Ball - Ballroom & Latin Dance to 70's Music
